class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Gane tem estilo Battle Royale, ou seja, com uma grande arena onde apenas um jogador vai ser o vitorioso e sobrevivente.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="2"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico"><div                 alt="Como baixar vídeos do YouTube sem precisar instalar programas"></figure><span class="tt-card-top-videos-item-text gui-color-primary">Como baixar vídeos do YouTube sem precisar instalar programas</span></div></a></section><footer class="gui-card-footer"><a class="gui-link-more gui-color-primary-link" href="http://www.techtudo.com.br/videos/">Veja mais vídeos</a></footer></div></div><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm2"><div id="banner_rm2" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="area-direita-b"><section class="widget-tudosobre-forum forum-categoria gui-card techtudo-card"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-secondary-bg techtudo-card-title"><a href="http://forum.techtudo.com.br/"><h2 class="gui-text-title ajuste-fonte-tt">F&oacute;rum</h2></a></header><section class="gui-card-content"><ul class="tt-tudosobre-forum--perguntas-forum"><li class="tt-tudosobre-forum--pergunta-forum"><a class="tt-tudosobre-forum--pergunta-link"

e&&(e=new Error(e)),i("err",[e,c.now()])}},{}],2:[function(e,n,t){function r(e,n){var t=[],r="",i=0;for(r in e)o.call(e,r)&&(t[i]=n(r,e[r]),i+=1);return t}var o=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty;n.exports=r},{}],3:[function(e,n,t){function r(e,n,t){n||(n=0),"undefined"==typeof t&&(t=e?e.length:0);for(var r=-1,o=t-n||0,i=Array(o<0?0:o);++r<o;)i[r]=e[n+r];return i}n.exports=r},{}],4:[function(e,n,t){n.exports={exists:"undefined"!=typeof window.performance&&window.performance.timing&&"undefined"!=typeof window.performance.timing.navigationStart}},{}],ee:[function(e,n,t){function r(){}function o(e){function n(e){return e&&e instanceof r?e:e?f(e,u,i):i()}function t(t,r,o,i){if(!d.aborted||i){e&&e(t,r,o);for(var a=n(o),u=m(t),f=u.length,c=0;c<f;c++)u[c].apply(a,r);var p=s[y[t]];return p&&p.push([b,t,r,a]),a}}function l(e,n){v[e]=m(e).concat(n)}function m(e){return v[e]||[]}function w(e){return p[e]=p[e]||o(t)}function g(e,n){c(e,function(e,t){n=n||"feature",y[t]=n,n in s||(s[n]=[])})}var v={},y={},b={on:l,emit:t,get:w,listeners:m,context:n,buffer:g,abort:a,aborted:!1};return b}function i(){return new r}function a(){(s.api||s.feature)&&(d.aborted=!0,s=d.backlog={})}var u="nr@context",f=e("gos"),c=e(2),s={},p={},d=n.exports=o();d.backlog=s},{}],gos:[function(e,n,t){function r(e,n,t){if(o.call(e,n))return e[n];var r=t();if(Object.defineProperty&&Object.keys)try{return Object.defineProperty(e,n,{value:r,writable:!0,enumerable:!1}),r}catch(i){}return e[n]=r,r}var o=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty;n.exports=r},{}],handle:[function(e,n,t){function r(e,n,t,r){o.buffer([e],r),o.emit(e,n,t)}var o=e("ee").get("handle");n.exports=r,r.ee=o},{}],id:[function(e,n,t){function r(e){var n=typeof e;return!e||"object"!==n&&"function"!==n?-1:e===window?0:a(e,i,function(){return o++})}var o=1,i="nr@id",a=e("gos");n.exports=r},{}],loader:[function(e,n,t){function r(){if(!x++){var e=h.info=NREUM.info,n=d.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];if(setTimeout(s.abort,3e4),!(e&&e.licenseKey&&e.applicationID&&n))return s.abort();c(y,function(n,t){e[n]||(e[n]=t)}),f("mark",["onload",a()+h.offset],null,"api");var t=d.createElement("script");t.src="https://"+e.agent,n.parentNode.insertBefore(t,n)}}function o(){"complete"===d.readyState&&i()}function i(){f("mark",["domContent",a()+h.offset],null,"api")}function a(){return E.exists&&performance.now?Math.round(performance.now()):(u=Math.max((new Date).getTime(),u))-h.offset}var u=(new Date).getTime(),f=e("handle"),c=e(2),s=e("ee"),p=window,d=p.document,l="addEventListener",m="attachEvent",w=p.XMLHttpRequest,g=w&&w.prototype;NREUM.o={ST:setTimeout,CT:clearTimeout,XHR:w,REQ:p.Request,EV:p.Event,PR:p.Promise,MO:p.MutationObserver};var v=""+location,y={beacon:"bam.nr-data.net",errorBeacon:"bam.nr-data.net",agent:"js-agent.newrelic.com/nr-1026.min.js"},b=w&&g&&g[l]&&!/CriOS/.test(navigator.userAgent),h=n.exports={offset:u,now:a,origin:v,features:{},xhrWrappable:b};e(1),d[l]?(d[l]("DOMContentLoaded",i,!1),p[l]("load",r,!1)):(d[m]("onreadystatechange",o),p[m]("onload",r)),f("mark",["firstbyte",u],null,"api");var x=0,E=e(4)},{}]},{},["loader"]);</script><script type="text/javascript">window.NREUM||(NREUM={});NREUM.info={"beacon":"bam.nr-data.net","queueTime":0,"licenseKey":"7217d473ba","agent":"","transactionName":"blVSYUpZCEdXV01RXFcfdkBWWxJdWVoWSFtQXF9GFkgJRkJVVRZFUFVHRgJwCVlTYlBdRBdXVUE=","applicationID":"16570753","errorBeacon":"bam.nr-data.net","applicationTime":242}</script>

                  <li class="item thumb" data-ttid="315727" data-especial-id="33">

    </p>
    <p class="button-container">
      <a data-ga-label="panfleto|superior" href="https://assine.globo.com/philos/checkout-carrinho.action?tf=B&produtosCarrinho=539&origemId=308" data-signup="try-overlay" class="button button-orange ga-experimente">inicie seu 1º mês grátis</a>
      <span class="obs">Você pode cancelar a qualquer hora.</span>
    </p>

    <p class="or">
      <span class="text">ou</span>
    </p>

    <p class="special-price">
      <span class="text">APROVEITE! Clientes das operadoras abaixo podem assinar por um preço especial.</span>
      <!-- <span class="price">
        <span class="currency">R$</span>
        <span class="value">14,</span>
        <span class="cents">90/mês</span>
      </span> -->
    </p>
    <ul class="operators-list">
      <li class="item">
        <img src="http://static.philos.tv/img/logo-net.png" alt="" />

          Assine no site ou pelo NOW Clube
        </p>

      <li class="item">

        <p class="text text-vivo">
          Ligue para 106 15
        </p>
      </li>
    </ul>

      já é assinante? <span class="do-login button-login">faça seu login</span>
    </p>

  <div class="welcome-modal" id="welcome-modal">
  <div class="modal-header">
    <p class="logo">
      Philos
    </p>
    <p class="text">
      Bem-vindo ao Philos
    </p>
  </div>
  <div class="modal-content">
    <p class="description">
      Aqui você assiste aos melhores documentários de arte, ciência, história e atualidades, além de danças e espetáculos. O 1º mês é grátis. Experimente já!
    </p>
    <p class="button-container">
      <a href="/sobre" class="button button-orange">Conheça o Philos</a>
      <span class="skip-to-site">
        ou <span class="close ga-panfleto" data-ga-label="continue-no-site">continue no site</span>
      </span>
    </p>
    <p class="already-user">
      Já é assinante? <span class="do-login ga-panfleto" data-ga-label="faca-o-seu-login" data-ga-login>faça o seu login</span>
    </p>

  <script type="text/javascript">
    var freshPage = true;

  <!--<script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/main.js"></script>-->
  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/css-browser-selector.js"></script>

  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/jquery.cookie.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/perfect-scrollbar.jquery.min.js"></script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
    Philos.Player.setHeight();
    var streamSense = new ns_.StreamSense({}, 'http://b.scorecardresearch.com/p?c1=2&c2=18519737');

    /* Fechar modal de assine e abrir modal de login */
    $('.do-login').on("click", function(){
      $('.tryout-overlay').fadeOut();
    });

    /* Abrir modal overlay */
    $(".jexperimente, .show-modal-tryout").on('click', function(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      $('.tryout-overlay').fadeIn();
      $('.tryout-overlay .button-close').on('click', function(){
        $('.tryout-overlay').fadeOut();
      });
    });

    $(document).ready(function() {
      $(window).resize(function() {
        if($(window).outerWidth() <= 768 ){
          var nav = $('.back-top-container');
          $(window).scroll(function () {
            if ($(this).scrollTop() > 320) {
                nav.fadeIn();
            } else {
                nav.fadeOut();
            }
          });
        }
      });
    });
    var loginAuth = new Philos.Modal({element:'#login-auth', iframe: true, url: 'https://gsatmulti.globo.com/oauth/authorize/?response_type=code&client_id=aa93ac4b-7a3e-407a-b17a-e2cdf6794f77&redirect_uri=http://philos.tv/vod/auth/client-side/'});
    $('.button-login').on('click', function(){
      loginAuth.open();
    });
    $('.button-not-auth-watch-later').on('click', function(){
      loginAuth.open();
    });
    $('.button-not-auth-watch-later-tooltip').on('click', function(){
      loginAuth.open();
    });
    $(window).resize(function() {
      loginAuth.setPosition();
    });

    var welcomeModal = new Philos.Modal({element: '#welcome-modal', autoPosition: false, noScroll: false});
    if($.cookie('welcome_modal_philos') == undefined){
    // if(true){
      welcomeModal.open();

      $('.skip-to-site .close').on('click', function(){
        welcomeModal.close();
      });

      $('.already-user .do-login').on('click', function(){
        welcomeModal.close();
        loginAuth.open();
      });

      $.cookie('welcome_modal_philos', true, { expires: 7300, path: '/' });
    }



      var _gaq = _gaq || [];
      _gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-29836789-1']);
      _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);

      (function() {
        var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
        ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
        var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);

      })();


    // ga('create', 'UA-29836789-1', 'auto');  // Replace with your property ID.
    //voltar para o codigo acima quando o site for para produçao!!!
    // ga('create', 'UA-37984929-2', 'auto');  // Replace with your property ID.

    var vod = {};


    vod.midia = {
      programa: "",
      slug: "",
      id_globo_videos: "",
      categoria: "",
      temp: "",
      ep: "",
      programa_slug: "",
      progress: ""
    }

    vod.url = {
    	absolute_url: "http://philos.tv/",
    	acaoMidiaUsuario: "/meu-perfil/configuracoes/ajax/adicionar-midia-usuario/",
    	assistirMaisTardePaginacao: "/meu-perfil/assistir-mais-tarde/",
    	assistidosRecentementePaginacao: "/meu-perfil/assistidos-recentemente/",
    	conteAmigos: "/meu-perfil/configuracoes/ajax/conte-amigos/",
    	controleParental: "/meu-perfil/configuracoes/ajax/controle-parental/",
    	minhaConta: "/meu-perfil/configuracoes/ajax/minha-conta/",
    	antiFlagra: "/meu-perfil/configuracoes/ajax/anti-flagra/",
    	deletarRedeSocial: "/vod/social/delete-network/"
    }

    vod.url.social = {
    	"uninstall": {
    		"facebook": "/vod/social/delete-network/",
    		"twitter": "/vod/social/delete-network/"
    	},
    	"install": {
    		"facebook": "/vod/social/facebook-auth-url-json/",
    		"twitter": "/vod/social/twitter-auth-url-json/"
    	}
    }

    vod.config = {
    	site_titulo: "Philos",
    	site_slug: "philos",
    	is_authenticated: false,
    	disclaimer: "",
    	metadadosEsquema: "1",
    	lazyOptions: {
    		effect: 'fadeIn'
    	},
    	facebook: {
    		'scope': "publish_stream",
    	}
    }

    vod.utils = {
    	"currentTimeValue": parseInt(1425, 10),
    	"GA": {
    		'slot_1':11,
    		'slot_2':12,
    		'slot_3':13,
    		'slot_4':14,
    		'slot_5':15,
    		'slot_6':16,
            'metric_1':1
    	}
    }

    vod.operadora = {
    	'nomeOperadora': ""
    }

    
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/ga-power.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript">

    var data = new Date();
    var minutos = 30;
    data.setTime(data.getTime() + (minutos * 60 * 1000));
    $.cookie('gsat_utmb', 'b.' + data.getTime(), { path: '/', expires: data });
    $.cookie('gsat_utmc', 'c.' + data.getTime(), { path: '/' });

    

    


      utmSource = Philos.Core.getParameterByName('utm_source');
      utmMedium = Philos.Core.getParameterByName('utm_medium');
      if(utmSource != null){
        $.cookie('_utm_source',utmSource);
      } else{
        $.removeCookie('_utm_source');
      }
      if(utmMedium != null){
        $.cookie('_utm_medium',utmMedium);
      } else {
        $.removeCookie('_utm_medium');
      }
  </script>
  <script>
  window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
    FB.init({
      appId      : '1727045824193111',
      xfbml      : true,
      version    : 'v2.5'
    });
  };

  (function(d, s, id){
     var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
     if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
     js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
     js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js";
     fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
     }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
  </script>
  
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/owl.carousel.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/jquery.tooltipster.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/card-tooltip.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/exclui-video.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">


  new Philos.Search();

  Philos.Player = (function(Module) {
    Module.page = "home";
    
    Module.vodID = 3927001;
    
    Module.ATOKEN = "";
    Module.payTvServiceProvider = vod.operadora.nomeOperadora;
    Module.vodBlocked = true;
    return Module;
  }(Philos.Player || {}));

  // atualiza os dados do player a cada 15 * 1000
  // segundos para acompanhar a programação atual
  firstTime = false;
  function refreshNowAndLater(){
    // scheduleTest();
    var date = new Date();
    var time = date.getTime();

    function setWidth(params){
      params.end = params.end * 1000;
      params.start = params.start * 1000;
      var diff = params.end - params.start;
      var nowStart = params.time - params.start;
      var percent = (nowStart / diff);
      var cssPercent = parseFloat(percent).toFixed(2) * 100;
      $('.progress-live .background').css({
        'width': cssPercent + '%'
      });
    }

    $.getJSON( "/api/programacao/nowandlater/", function( data ) {
      $('.video-info .classind').hide();
      $('.button-info').hide();
      if (data.atual.thumb_image != '') {
        $('#thumb-live').attr('src',data.atual.thumb_image);
      } else {
        $('.thumb-container #thumb-live').remove();
      }
      if(data.atual.duracao != null){
        $('.video-info .classind').show();
        $('.button-info').show();
        var isSerie = data.atual.titulo_serie != '';
        if(isSerie){
            $('.video-info .title').html('<a href="'+ data.atual.url+'">'+ data.atual.titulo_serie +'</a><span></span>').addClass('is-program');
            $('.video-info .ep').html('<a href="'+ data.atual.url+'">'+ data.atual.titulo_episodio +'</a>');
            $('.vod-desc-box .title').text(data.atual.titulo_serie);
            $('.vod-desc-box .ep').text(data.atual.titulo_episodio);
        } else{
            $('.video-info .title').html('<a href="'+ data.atual.url+'">'+ data.atual.titulo_episodio +'</a>');
            $('.video-info .ep').hide();
            $('.vod-desc-box .title').text(data.atual.titulo_episodio);
        }
        var vodTitle = data.atual.cms_id + ' - ' + (data.atual.titulo_serie != '' ? data.atual.titulo_serie + ' - ' + data.atual.titulo_episodio : data.atual.titulo_episodio);
        $('.video-info .original-title').text(vodTitle);

        $('.video-info .description').text(data.atual.sinopse);
        $('.video-info .vod-link').attr('href',data.atual.url);
        $('.serie-link').attr('href',data.atual.url);
        if(data.atual.classind == 0){
          $('.video-info .classind').addClass('classind-0').text('L');
        } else {
          $('.video-info .classind').addClass('classind-'+data.atual.classind).text(data.atual.classind);
        }

        if(data.atual.ano_inicio != null) {
          var pipe = '';
          if(data.atual.duracao != null) {pipe = ' | ';}
          $('.video-info .year').text(data.atual.ano_inicio + pipe);
        }
        if(data.atual.duracao != null) {
          $('.video-info .duration').text(data.atual.duracao + ' min.');
        }

        if(data.atual.expiracao != null){
           var pipe = '';
          if(data.atual.duracao != null) {pipe = ' | ';}
          $('.video-info .expire').text(pipe + 'Disponível até ' + data.atual.expiracao);
        }

        if(data.atual.watched_later){
          $('.player-controls .button-watch-later').addClass('button-watch-later-active');
          $('.player-controls .button-watch-later').find('.texto').text('remover');
        } else {
          $('.player-controls .button-watch-later').removeClass('button-watch-later-active');
          $('.player-controls .button-watch-later').find('.texto').text('Assistir mais tarde');
        }
        // $('.video-info .expire').text('Disponível até ' + data.atual.expiracao);

        var params = {'start': data.atual.inicio_timestamp, 'end': data.atual.fim_timestamp, 'time': time};
        setWidth(params);

        $('.video-info .temp').text(data.atual.temp);

        $('.next-show .time').text(data.proximo.horario);
        $('.next-show .title').text(data.proximo.titulo_episodio);
        Philos.Player = (function(Module) {
          Module.cmsID = data.atual.cms_id;
          Module.vodLink = 'http://philos.tv' + data.atual.url;
          Module.vodThumb = data.atual.thumb_image;
          return Module;
        }(Philos.Player || {}));
      }
    });
  }
  refreshNowAndLater();
  setInterval(function(){refreshNowAndLater()}, 60 * 1000);

  setTimeout(function(){
    $(".gallery").owlCarousel({
      items : 1,
      itemsCustom : false,
      singleItem : true,
      itemsScaleUp : false,
      navigation: true,
      lazyLoad: true,
      rewindNav: false,
      pagination: false,
      navigationText: ['',''],
      theme: 'home-gallery',
      beforeInit: function(){

        var owl = this;
        $(".categories li").on("click", function(){
          owl.goTo($(this).index());
        });
      },
      afterInit: function(){
        setTimeout(galleryHeight, 1000);
      },
      afterMove: function() {
        $(".categories").css("margin-left", "0");
        var current = this.owl.currentItem;
        $(".categories li").removeClass("active").eq(current).addClass("active");
        if($(window).width() < 481 ){
          var distancia = $('.categories ul li.active').position().left;
          distancia = (distancia*-1);
          if( current == 0 ){
            $(".categories").css("margin-left", "0");
          }else{
            $(".categories").css("margin-left", distancia - 15 + (($(window).width()-$('.categories ul li.active').width())/2) );
          }
        }

      },
      beforeUpdate: function(){
        galleryHeight();
      }
    });

  },600);

  function galleryHeight(){

    if(Philos.Screen.getSize() == 'small') {
      console.log("entrou aqui");
      var height_mobile = ($(".card-thumb-gallery .item.card").outerHeight(true) * 3) + 23;
      $('.cats-showcase-container').css("height", height_mobile + 'px');
    }

    $('.home-vermais').on('click', function(){
      $('.cats-showcase-container').css("height", '100%');
      $(this).hide();
    });
  }

    function resizeContainer(){
      $('.button-show-info').hide();
      setTimeout(function () {
        var height = window.innerHeight || $(window).height();
        var width = window.innerWidth || $(window).width();
        if(height < width){ // if(landscape)
          if($('#player-wrapper.is-playing').length <= 0){
            $('.button-show-info').show();
          } else{
            $('.button-show-info').hide();
          }
          $('.video-container').css('height',height);
        } else{
          $('.video-container').css('height','');
          $('.button-show-info').hide();
        }
      },1000);
    }
    resizeContainer();
    $(window).on('orientationchange', resizeContainer);

</script>
<script src="http://s.videos.globo.com/p2/j/api.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://static.philos.tv/js/player.js"></script>

  if(!$('html').hasClass('mobile')){
    Philos.Player.welcomePlay();
  }
</script>

  <script>

    window.addEventListener('orientationchange', function() {
        if((navigator.userAgent.match(/iPhone/i)) || (navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad/i))) {
          setTimeout(function() {
              window.scrollTo(0, 0);
          }, 1000);
        }
    });

      Philos.contextVars = (function(Module){
        Module.staticUrl = "http://static.philos.tv/";
        return Module;
    }(Philos.contextVars || {}));

  </script>
</body>

		<script type="text/javascript">
			window._wpemojiSettings = {"baseUrl":"https:\/\/s.w.org\/images\/core\/emoji\/2.2.1\/72x72\/","ext":".png","svgUrl":"https:\/\/s.w.org\/images\/core\/emoji\/2.2.1\/svg\/","svgExt":".svg","source":{"concatemoji":"http:\/\/jobs.wordpress.net\/wp-includes\/js\/wp-emoji-release.min.js?ver=4.7.3"}};
			!function(a,b,c){function d(a){var b,c,d,e,f=String.fromCharCode;if(!k||!k.fillText)return!1;switch(k.clearRect(0,0,j.width,j.height),k.textBaseline="top",k.font="600 32px Arial",a){case"flag":return k.fillText(f(55356,56826,55356,56819),0,0),!(j.toDataURL().length<3e3)&&(k.clearRect(0,0,j.width,j.height),k.fillText(f(55356,57331,65039,8205,55356,57096),0,0),b=j.toDataURL(),k.clearRect(0,0,j.width,j.height),k.fillText(f(55356,57331,55356,57096),0,0),c=j.toDataURL(),b!==c);case"emoji4":return k.fillText(f(55357,56425,55356,57341,8205,55357,56507),0,0),d=j.toDataURL(),k.clearRect(0,0,j.width,j.height),k.fillText(f(55357,56425,55356,57341,55357,56507),0,0),e=j.toDataURL(),d!==e}return!1}function e(a){var c=b.createElement("script");c.src=a,c.defer=c.type="text/javascript",b.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(c)}var f,g,h,i,j=b.createElement("canvas"),k=j.getContext&&j.getContext("2d");for(i=Array("flag","emoji4"),c.supports={everything:!0,everythingExceptFlag:!0},h=0;h<i.length;h++)c.supports[i[h]]=d(i[h]),c.supports.everything=c.supports.everything&&c.supports[i[h]],"flag"!==i[h]&&(c.supports.everythingExceptFlag=c.supports.everythingExceptFlag&&c.supports[i[h]]);c.supports.everythingExceptFlag=c.supports.everythingExceptFlag&&!c.supports.flag,c.DOMReady=!1,c.readyCallback=function(){c.DOMReady=!0},c.supports.everything||(g=function(){c.readyCallback()},b.addEventListener?(b.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",g,!1),a.addEventListener("load",g,!1)):(a.attachEvent("onload",g),b.attachEvent("onreadystatechange",function(){"complete"===b.readyState&&c.readyCallback()})),f=c.source||{},f.concatemoji?e(f.concatemoji):f.wpemoji&&f.twemoji&&(e(f.twemoji),e(f.wpemoji)))}(window,document,window._wpemojiSettings);
		</script>
		<style type="text/css">
img.wp-smiley,
img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;
	border: none !important;
	box-shadow: none !important;
	height: 1em !important;
	width: 1em !important;
	margin: 0 .07em !important;
	vertical-align: -0.1em !important;
	background: none !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
}
</style>

		<div class="row job-list-col-labels">
